**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 43, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 134 4.0, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 102 2.0, [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 42 1.1 **Archetypes** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=60) (Level 4), [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98) (Level 6), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 6) **Prerequisites** a [familiar](/familiar-abilities) --- You infuse your familiar with additional magical energy. You can select four [familiar or master abilities](/familiar-abilities) each day, instead of two. **Special** (Wizard) If your arcane thesis is [improved familiar attunement](/ArcaneThesis.aspx?ID=1), your familiar's base number of familiar abilities, before adding any extra abilities from the arcane thesis, is four.
(Witch) Add the bonus familiar abilities you gain for being a witch to this amount. Enhanced Familiar leads to... [Incredible Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=1576), [Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1975)
